title: How to turn off DJ Sona music if you're the one using the skin
body:
When I press tab, theres no button to turn it off when I'm the one using the skin

I just want to listen to the regular league theme/song while ingame :c

It gets annoying listening to DJ Sona after 5 games

replies.body:
It's not much, but this seems to be the only official way of "turning off her music"

https://i.gyazo.com/e74b54484cea7281321b5e8fbcc9eabb.png
